songs.title: Nowadays, Pt. 3*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics From Snippet

[Chorus]
Aye, she said she wanna rafe with the star
She said she wanna the bottles by the bar
Swerving in the coupe, yeah, I'm going far-

[Verse 1: Lil Skies]
She in my bed, I'ma make her hit a high note
Tightrope, hold your balance, never fall down
Now they see me up, now they fake as fuck, they showin' fake smiles
I don't got no friends, I was lonely at the playground
Heart full of rage, hit the stage, let it my pain out

[Verse 2: Landon Cube]
-Friends
I'm just stuck up in my damn ways
In my ends, I was going to a damn waste
Got my momma, got my brothers that will never change
They don't want it like I want it, they gon' feel the pain
And that's the thing and that's the damn thing
That's why I'm distant from the crowd-
